document_data.name: Clan Dankil
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Dankil''' was a [[Duergar]] clan active in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Beneath the City of the Dead|18}}{{Cite adventurers league/A Change of Address|15}}
document_data.Relationships: The Dankil clan was known among the [[dwarf|dwarven]] community of Waterdeep to be at odds with the [[Stonebridge]] clan because of trade disputes spanning generations. ''Circa'' the {{yearlinkName|1492}}, the Stonebridges freed [[ghouls]] from the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] in an attempt to get revenge at the Dankils.
